plugin.name: ðŸ–¥ï¸ Preview
plugin.description: Shows HTML preview of the current note, including Mermaid diagrams and MathJax equations. Requires NP v3.9.2.
plugin.author: Jonathan Clark
plugin.lastUpdateInfo:
v0.4.3: stop updates stealing focus from the note editor.
v0.4.2: fix regression stopping Mermaid rendering.
v0.4.1: improve display of [[notelinks]], ==highlights== and ~underlining~.
v0.4.0: new command "/start live preview".
v0.3.1: display improvements and turn off print button for iOS.
v0.3.0: print button, trigger, updated Mermaid library, use appropriate Mermaid theme.

plugin.commands.name: open preview in browser
plugin.commands.description: Open note preview in browser ready to print

plugin.commands.name: start live preview
plugin.commands.description: Preview note in HTML window, and add a trigger to enable near-live update to it

plugin.settings.title: Log Level
plugin.settings.description:
Set how much logging output will be displayed when executing Tidy commands in NotePlan Plugin Console Logs (NotePlan -> Help -> Plugin Console)

 - DEBUG: Show All Logs
 - INFO: Only Show Info, Warnings, and Errors
 - WARN: Only Show Errors or Warnings
 - ERROR: Only Show Errors
 - none: Don't show any logs
